src.clf.evaluation module¶

Description:

Comparing the performance of the different models

Collect all predictions and ground truth

Parameters:

  • Y_preds (list[list[str]]) – list of machine predictions

lists of lists (true labels, machine predictions)

list[list[list[str]]]

Compute the accuracy at cutoff k

Returns:

accuracy @k

Return type:

Compute the MRR (average RR) at cutoff k

Parameters:

items (list[list[list[str]]]) – lists of lists (true labels, machine predictions)

Returns:

Return type:

float

  • X_test (pd.Series) – test data
